about_the_game:
“Georgie And Me” will have the player assume the role of an intergalactic hired gun named 'Jack Kursby' in a space-groove visualized 1977. Along side him is his partner dog, 'Georgie'. The duo's operation they call 'K&G Services' is located on a privately owned discrete Moon called “Khromos”. When the freelance partners are summoned to pursue a case in a most peculiar star-sector, their skills and partnership are strained against a most despicable enemy.

A UNIQUE PARTNERSHIP

Jack and Georgie aren't your typical partnership, they're an odd couple of sorts. Despite their disagreements with one another, they find a way through the world that weighs itself down on their shoulders. You could say their opposition is what keeps them alive.

PLANETARY ANNIHILATION

Arm yourself to the teeth with up to 9 different weapons with 9 alternate firing modes with their own different ways of devastating your opposition. While Georgie has his own way of dealing with enemies, you can command him to use special abilities, as well as utilize "partner abilities" to reek havoc on the battlefield.

JOURNEY ACROSS THE STARS

Explore over 20 levels of numerous planets, planetoids, and moons alike for a journey across the stars. Use your Nebulon ship to access a galactic map to set a destination and go boldly where 'some' have gone before. Fight multitudes of different enemies that will test your acuity, acquire vending items to buff your character, and unlock perks to give you special abilities to give you an edge on the onslaught of overwhelming odds against you.

ACCESSIBILITY OPTIONS

  • Nausea Side-Effects (on/off)

  • Inversion/Vertigo Sphere Effects (on/off)

  • Splurpo Vendor/Regoovinator Highlight (on/off)

  • Splurpo Vendor/Regoovinator Highlight Color

  • Destructible Hazards Highlight (on/off)

  • Destructible Hazards Highlight Color

  • Health Capsules Highlight (on/off)

  • Health Capsules Highlight Color

  • Slow Expulsion Fields [+1sec] (on/off)

  • Ozmoid Puzzle Overrides (on/off)

  • Environmental Light Flicker (on/off)

  • Crosshair Color

  • Slowed Game Speed (on/off) [-7% global time dilation]

  • Enhanced Sharpness (on/off)

  • World Emissive Outline (on/off)

  • Aimed Enemy Radiance (on/off)

  • Georgie Head Prompt Color

  • Georgie Amp Tag Color

  • Waypoints (on/off)

  • Waypoint Color

  • Interactive Symbol (on/off)

  • Interactive Symbol Color

  • Interactive Symbol Scale

  • Game Assist Captions

  • Hacking Assist

  • Color Blind Assist

  • Audio Assist Cues

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood, gore, violence and depicts advertisements for alcohol and escort services within a science-fiction setting, as well as partial nudity.

legal_notice:
EPILEPSY WARNING: This game contains lighting effects and patterns that may trigger individuals with history of Epilepsy or light/photo sensitivity. This may induce seizures. Please consult a doctor before playing.

Copyright © 2017 Georgie and Me, developed by CD Jones.
name: Georgie and Me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit or later
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2700x/ Intel Corei7-9700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060/ Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: - Average expected FPS on Max Settings 1440p 144hz{60-90} *SSD strongly recommended; game features several real-time enemy spawns with an instant respawn system and LOD fur tessellation.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit or later
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5800x/ Intel Corei5-12600k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2070 Super/ Radeon RX 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: - Average expected FPS on Max Settings 1440p 144hz{90-120} *SSD strongly recommended; game features several real-time enemy spawns with an instant respawn system and LOD fur tessellation.

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Atos criminosos
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Assume the role of Jack Kursby, an intergalactic hired gun with his partner dog, Georgie. Together your skills will be strained against a most despicable enemy in a high octane story across the stars.
